subject: Order stuck in delivery SSN5412
description_text:
Good morning! I recently checked my order delivery (SSN5412) in it
certainly did not moved from the 31st of December since it was processed at
the export parcel center. Is anything going wrong with it?
Kind regards.

conversations.body_text: Hi Cezar Claudiu,    We apologize and will look into it for you.

Any update on this issue?

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 11:34 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Cezar Claudiu,  I apologize for the delayed response.  We've confirmed your order was shipped in two separate packages. One has already arrived—have you received it?  The other package was shipped on the 15th and is currently in transit.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=CE326638867DE,YT2600700706234684
